article_title: Paul Krugman's Truth-Twisting on Obamacare: A Neverending Story

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: If there were a Nobel Prize for truth-twisting, Paul Krugman surely would be heavily favored to win. His most recent blog post offers ample supporting evidence for this proposition. He claims that critics of Obamacare are zero for six in their "predictions of Obamacare doom." But the reality is that Prof. Krugman himself is at best batting 2 for 6.
og.title: Paul Krugman's Truth-Twisting on Obamacare: A Neverending Story
